name: Ratatosk
description:
Note that the game was made in 28 hours at local Ludum Dare Edition and contains a lot of bugs!!! Have fun discovering them all ;)

You are the squirrel Ratatosk. You need to deliver the message to the Nidhogg. Use magic cards to avoid obstacles and eliminate enemies. 

You can read the full description here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/ratatosk
